name: Soul Reactor
description:
Our Submission for GMTK GameJam 2019
Made by my friend Natro and me.

This is Soul Reactor!

In this puzzle platformer, you're playing as a soul and are able to take control of different objects within the reactor facility.
Somebody messed around with the cables and now the reactor is in trouble.

You can take control of static orbs meant for teleportation and the units for interaction with sockets.
The goal is the last socket at the bottom, which will make the reactor glow green.

Controls:
ArrowKeys - Movement
X - Interact with the sockets (when unit) C - Toggle control of unit
Space - Jump (when unit)
